TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit Rectangle extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 儲存四個為一組的整數，代表矩形的位置和大小。

span.span: Stores a set of four integers that represent the location and size of a rectangle

remarks.format: ## Remarks 矩形由定義其， ，以及所代表的左上角屬性。A rectangle is defined by its , , and upper-left corner represented by the property. 若要繪製的矩形，您需要物件和物件。To draw rectangles, you need a object and a object. 物件提供方法，而物件儲存的行，例如色彩和寬度的功能。The object provides the method, and the object stores features of the line, such as color and width. 在繪製矩形的單位由和用於繪製物件的圖形的屬性。The units the rectangle is drawn in is determined by the and properties of the graphics object used for drawing. 預設單位為像素。The default unit is pixels. 若要繪製填滿色彩，您需要物件和物件衍生自例如或。To draw a filled with color, you need a object and an object derived from such as or . 物件提供方法和物件會提供色彩和填滿的資訊。The object provides the method and the object provides the color and fill information. 更進階的形狀，使用物件。For more advanced shapes, use a object. ## Examples 下列範例會繪製在其左上角的矩形 （10，10）。The following example draws a rectangle with its upper-left corner at (10, 10). 矩形的寬度為 100，高度為 50。The rectangle has a width of 100 and a height of 50. 第二個引數傳遞給建構函式表示畫筆寬度為 5 像素。The second argument passed to the constructor indicates that the pen width is 5 pixels. 繪製矩形，畫筆內置矩形的界限上。When the rectangle is drawn, the pen is centered on the rectangle's boundary. 矩形的側邊的畫筆寬度為 5，因為會繪製 5 像素寬、 這類繪製 1 個像素界限，2 個像素繪製在內部和外部繪製 2 像素為單位。Because the pen width is 5, the sides of the rectangle are drawn 5 pixels wide, such that 1 pixel is drawn on the boundary itself, 2 pixels are drawn on the inside, and 2 pixels are drawn on the outside. 如需有關畫筆對齊的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 設定畫筆寬度和對齊](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-set-pen-width-and-alignment.md)。For more details on pen alignment, see [How to: Set Pen Width and Alignment](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-set-pen-width-and-alignment.md). 下圖顯示產生的矩形。The following illustration shows the resulting rectangle. 虛線顯示，其中會有已繪製矩形如果畫筆寬度便是一個像素。The dotted lines show where the rectangle would have been drawn if the pen width had been one pixel. 矩形左上角的放大的檢視顯示黑色粗線會置於虛線。The enlarged view of the upper-left corner of the rectangle shows that the thick black lines are centered on those dotted lines. ![畫筆](~/add/media/pens1.gif "畫筆")![Pens](~/add/media/pens1.gif "Pens") 範例為了搭配 Windows Form 使用而設計，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.UsingAPen#21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.UsingAPen/CS/Class1.cs#21)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.UsingAPen#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.UsingAPen/VB/Class1.vb#21)]

summary.span: 根據指定的數量來放大這個 。

span.span: Enlarges this by the specified amount.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法來放大這個矩形，而不是它的複本。This method enlarges this rectangle, not a copy of it. 矩形變大時雙向沿座標軸。The rectangle is enlarged in both directions along an axis. 例如，如果 50 x 50 矩形在 x 軸的 50 變大時，產生的矩形將 150 單位長 （原始 50、 負方向 50 和方向會加上 50） 維護矩形的幾何中心。For example, if a 50 by 50 rectangle is enlarged by 50 in the x-axis, the resultant rectangle will be 150 units long (the original 50, the 50 in the minus direction, and the 50 in the plus direction) maintaining the rectangle's geometric center. ## Examples 下列範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 程式碼會建立和放大由兩個軸的 50 個單位。The code creates a and enlarges it by 50 units in both axes. 繪製矩形螢幕變大 （黑色） 之前和之後擴大 （紅色）。The rectangle is drawn to screen before inflation (black) and after inflation (red). [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples/VB/form1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法來放大這個矩形，而不是它的複本。This method enlarges this rectangle, not a copy of it. 矩形變大時雙向沿座標軸。The rectangle is enlarged in both directions along an axis. 例如，如果 50 x 50 矩形在 x 軸的 50 變大時，產生的矩形將 150 單位長 （原始 50、 負方向 50 和方向會加上 50） 維護矩形的幾何中心。For example, if a 50 by 50 rectangle is enlarged by 50 in the x-axis, the resultant rectangle will be 150 units long (the original 50, the 50 in the minus direction, and the 50 in the plus direction) maintaining the rectangle's geometric center. 如果有任一個`x`或`y`是負數，結構縮小對應方向。If either `x` or `y` is negative, the structure is deflated in the corresponding direction. ## Examples 下列範例會建立結構，並放大 100 單位 x 軸方向：The following example creates a structure and enlarges it by 100 units in the x-axis direction: [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples/VB/form1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會建立一份`rect`、 放大複本，然後傳回 放大的複本。This method makes a copy of `rect`, enlarges the copy, and then returns the enlarged copy. 矩形變大時雙向沿座標軸。The rectangle is enlarged in both directions along an axis. 例如，如果 50 x 50 矩形在 x 軸的 50 變大時，產生的矩形將 150 單位長 （原始 50、 負方向 50 和方向會加上 50） 維護矩形的幾何中心。For example, if a 50 by 50 rectangle is enlarged by 50 in the x-axis, the resultant rectangle will be 150 units long (the original 50, the 50 in the minus direction, and the 50 in the plus direction) maintaining the rectangle's geometric center. ## Examples 下列範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 程式碼會建立和放大由兩個軸的 50 個單位。The code creates a and enlarges it by 50 units in both axes. 請注意，產生的矩形 （紅色） 中兩個座標軸 150 單位。Notice that the resulting rectangle (red) is 150 units in both axes. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples/VB/form1.vb#1)]

span.span: A rectangle to union.

summary.span: 取得 結構，該結構包含兩個 結構的聯集。

span.span: Gets a structure that contains the union of two structures.

returns.span: 結構，限定兩個 結構的聯集下限。

span.span: A structure that bounds the union of the two structures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當兩個矩形的其中一個是空的這表示所有的值零，方法會傳回起點的矩形 （0，0） 高度和非空白矩形的寬度。When one of the two rectangles is empty, meaning all of its values are zero, the method returns a rectangle with a starting point of (0, 0), and the height and width of the non-empty rectangle. 例如，如果您有兩個矩形： A = （0，0，則為 0，0） 和 B = （1，1，2，2），然後 A 的聯集，而 B 是 （0，0，則為 2，2）。For example, if you have two rectangles: A = (0, 0; 0, 0) and B = (1, 1; 2, 2), then the union of A and B is (0, 0; 2, 2). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 這個範例是針對搭配 Windows Form 使用而設計的。This example is designed for use with a Windows Form. 此程式碼貼到表單，並呼叫`ShowRectangleUnion`方法時處理表單的事件，將傳遞`e`為。Paste this code into a form and call the `ShowRectangleUnion` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.RectanglesAndPoints#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.RectanglesAndPoints/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.RectanglesAndPoints#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.RectanglesAndPoints/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.RectanglesAndPoints#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.RectanglesAndPoints/VB/form1.vb#4)]
